comments:
Create a scrapbook page in project Test
Perform an evaluation
Move the scrapbook page to project Test2
Get error dialog (cannot retrieve scrapbook runtime settings. Setting will 
revert to default)

!ENTRY org.eclipse.jdt.debug.ui 4 150 Jun 03, 2002 16:18:17.358

We recover gracefully, and this is uncommon. Deferred.

This was worse than it looked...the scrapbook page that was copied or moved to 
a different project was still using the old project to get an evaluation 
context and local evaluation engine.

Fixed by doing more cleanup on the existing change hook we have been 
using..JavaSnippetEditor#setTitle(String). See 
JavaSnippetEditor#cleanupOnRenameOrMove()
